BusDK Design Document

Register a fixed asset

Record a new asset acquisition so depreciation and disposals can be booked deterministically.

Owner: bus assets.

This action is required in bookkeeping so the register can be used as a deterministic input for posting, period-based review, and audit navigation.

← Fixed assets Fixed assets —
